reviews.review_title: Warm, sulty, sophisticated but use lightly!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous scent. Can be overpowering at first, needs time to set and blend with skin. Great for evening, smells luxurious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The dry down is so cozy and inviting. It's that scent that makes you ask a person what they are wearing. It's light but sooo good! I have been searching for my new scent and this may be it!!

reviews.review_title: A signature scent I wish lasted longer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I write this with disdain, as Chloe Nomade has been my favorite scent for the past few years. I have a full size perfume with a friend, lotion, and have been loyal to nomad for years. My only problem is that this scent does not last long. 2.5 hours max, I still bring a mini with me when I go out lol. I wish I could find a scent I like as much that lasts, but I simply canu2019t so continue to stock up on this scent that works day to night and across seasons. Itu2019s a signature.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was influenced to buy from a talk show.  It is awful!  I love Tom Ford, most of Chanel, Aerin, Hermes and Ju2019Dore.  Kayla vanilla is gorgeous.  Stronger types in winter florals in hotter mos.  To  give you a sampling .  Strong alcohol smell juvenile drug store ish

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my all time favorite scent! I wear it everyday and get so many compliments. It feels sweet & soft-yet-it lasts all day long. If you like to layer-I would mix with sol di jenero 68, Versace Eros or Oakcha peach rings.  Eros

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A friend came over and was wearing this, and after she told me what it was, I bought it immediately. This smells rich. This smells like a 5-star hotel lobby. This smells like I go to high end restaurants and order expensive cocktails. Whenever I walk by this bottle, I have to smell it. Just so seductive!

reviews.review_title: Not for me. Not different in a good way.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love many different types and families of fragrances. I enjoy finding unique scents. This smells like shoe leather or suede, not in a good way I fear. I can see how some may potentially enjoy it. But the scent is not perfumey at all to me, and definitely not for this price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I only have a sample of this but itu2019s on my list to purchase. Itu2019s a confident scent while still being understated. I can imagine it being worn by an old money, clean girl type. Someone with a chic, minimalistic sense of style.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVED this scent. It was a soft and unique scent. Very difficult to describe. Some bright vanilla tones. I wore it continuously for a year before deciding to switch up my scent. I hope they donu2019t get rid of it, because I find myself going back to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Such a beautiful earthy sexy scent. Could totally be a signature scent or going out scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells a bit.. old? The initial smell is nice but smells like an older perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It starts with a light, woody note on me. The dry down is where the citrus and warm, floral spice settle in nicely. The harmonious blend of notes, make this scent long lasting, unique and sexy. Easy for day or night wear.

reviews.review_title: Gender neutral/fem leaning; scent lasts all day
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love wearing this on its own or paired with a citrusy scent; it dries down less sharp than it originally goes on, but it lasts the whole day! This is my 3rd bottle and is a staple in my collection

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s spring, sheu2019s classic trendy.. fresh blow out wears pieces of jewelry sheu2019s been collecting over the years. Makeup flawless, clean nails, white or french tip.. you walk by and she smells light, feminine, clean, hint of sweet, fresh, and warm at the same time. Signature type scent. Easy to wear, and not headache inducing. Test it out, because the reviews can be mixed based off your nose and what your into. Mwah xx

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Soapy and heavy white floral to me. Funny how we smells fragrances differently. I'm just not understanding how so many people say it's a unique scent. Smells like generic fragrance magazine ads, I'm sensitive to white floral so gives me a headache. The woody notes dissappear within minutes and I'm left with Lau dry detergent and white floral. Pass.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Does smell mature. Almost musky. Not bad over all. To me it's like a men's fragrance than a women's.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like a mature heavier version of d&g light blue. Immediately you smell the citrus/orange notes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loving this scent! Definitely will repurchase. Does not last as long as some of my others though (Tom Ford literally stays on my clothes until I wash them). For reference, my fav scents are either clean, musky, or anything Gardenia.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this. The initial spray is very fresh and citrusy, after like 5 hours it turns into a more woody warmer scent (kinda smells like Xmas). This isnu2019t sweet, which I typically go for but still very feminine. I see myself wearing this to gym, sxhool, work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t think this fragrance gets enough hype. Itu2019s the perfect grungy floral, you get to smell like flowers without any of the powder that comes with most fragrances. It lasts ages and is such a uniqueperfume.

reviews.review_title: Takes you on the best scent journey!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like being a sexy book shop owner who moonlights as an adventurer that seeks out rare books in forgotten universities, abandoned libraries, and ruined temples...and who might just be a little bit magic. No but really, this is a great scent - goes on light and floral; wears down warm and spicy with a hint of incense (or at least that's what it smells like to me). Long lasting. Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely scent! Smelled it on my friend and it lingered. Immediately caught my attention like a good perfume should do. It smells really good layered with Gucci magnolia too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite fragrance to wear, not too strong or overwhelming itu2019s a nice crisp fragrance that smells great any time of the day, the scent is long lasting. A grown and sexy scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my favorites,  I started use it last year and still using. ud83dude0d

reviews.review_title: Pass - gave it to my Mother
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like there are some beautiful and inspiring notes happening here, but they are getting way too overpowered by something that turns it into a very heavy and nauseating fragrance. Pass for me, gave it to my Mom.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Personally I donu2019t smell anything floral at all. To me it smells like spices. It smells like Halloween to me. Like when you walk into a craft store in fall. I absolutely adore this scent but I donu2019t get floral at all.
Great smell that I wish could last longer. Smells clean

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: one of my staples!! this musky citrus smells super rich and amazing on my skin, and last forever. i think itu2019s a great projecting, not too sweet, and long last favorite. will forever repurchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: we loved this!! got it for my grandma as a gift and she loved it so much!! perfect for her lifestyle as she is always on the go but such a lovely scent too!!

I've been using this perfume since December 2019, I've had a few bottles since and it's one of my favourite perfumes ever! I find that with perfumes they really need to suit you and this is definitely the one for me! Amazing overall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite perfumes. I get lots of compliments. Itu2019s floral but not too fruity. Last a long time too. I like the small bottle because you can travel with it. Definitely buying again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great scent its floral but not to floral, got compliments, a nice perfume to have in your collection definitely would buy again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: love love! the citrus classy scent! it has this powerful sweet but citrus notes!

reviews.review_title: If I have a signature scent itu2019s this one
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my all time favorite scents! Iu2019ve been into niche fragrances lately and growing my collection of fragrances but I will always have to have this one in my collection. Thereu2019s just something about it. Love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this perfume and this is my second bottle. But I have had it for a few months and now it smells different. Like it went bad but I still have 3/4 of the bottle left. This did not happen with the first bottle.
Absolutely LOVEEE this one. It lasts on the entire day. Love that itu2019s strong & I get many compliments, which makes my day. ud83eude75

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This gets me so many compliments! Tried and will buy again. Maybe upgrade myself to the full size to save money. I love this scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bright, memorable, & self-assured. The plum keeps this tart & fresh, while the peach & freesia lend a jammy warmth & sweetness. Truly unique in todayu2019s designer perfume market, this brings to mind Laurel Canton of the 1970s. Best worm with confidence & a free spirit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been wearing this perfume for a little over a year. Clothes, hair, bedding. Itu2019s mesmerizing and captivating. I am in love. My other perfume loves are Lemon Tree and Chloe (just original)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent! I have been wearing Chloe for years but recently tried Nomad and wow itu2019s amazing. Floral and woody!

reviews.review_title: One of my perfumes for life
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is STUNNING. A perfect blend of warm florals with the oakmoss,  sweet but sophisticated. It's signature scent worthy and a compliment magnet! I work from home but i like to wear this on days I need a confidence boost on important work days or feel sexy on date niggts. Just a great one for special occasions. Also longevity is next level. It'll last forever... like days if you spray it on your clothes and I'm okay with that!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: WOW what a beautiful scent, classy clean warm and floral bought the travel size and I'm in love makes my mood instantly better new signature scent material for sure buying a bigger size of Nomad when done the travel size curious now on the one with dates and the jasmine one coming out.

Nomad is definitely a good name for this perfume. I think it will suit someone really free-spirited (nomadic, almost!) -- first wave of scent is spicy but not peppery, likely due to the oakmoss. On a dry-down you get a bit more very clean floral (not sweet floral) freshness. Not for me, but I like it better after 2 hours than at first spray.
Love this. Smells so good. I have the regular and travel. Perfect for days I am traveling or going to gym

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume so much. It leaves such a woodsy musky smell at the end of the day that is so comforting. Sometimes it sticks to my clothes even after laundry but it never smells bad! Absolutely lovely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this perfume. Someone gave me the purse spray version of this and I just loved it so much, I had to buy a bigger bottle. I feel so fancy when I wear this perfume and I get compliments

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is like a perfect fairy sent. Makes me think of an enchanted forest. Also makes me think of a sophisticated and cultured woman that knows what she wants in life and is going after her dreams. I donu2019t know how it can be both of those at once but it is for me. I love how different this perfume is from the rest of designer perfumes right now. I have around 30 perfumes and this one already has a spot in the top 3. I know I will repurchase after I finish my bottle. This perfume to me seems to preform beautifully in the colder months. Excited to see how it will preform in the warmer months. If you like unique fragrances more niche like I think you will appreciate this gem.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is EVERYTHING. It lasts all day (sometimes even after I shower!). I get compliments all the time, I've never smelled anything like it. New favorite, I'll be 50 and still wearing this. Got the travel size thinking I might carry it in my purse in case I needed a refresher during the day, I've yet to need another pump during a day. Even after 8 hours it's still strong, and I cannot put into words how AMAZING its scent is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received a sample and fell in love instantly. It reminds me of Chanel COCO Mademoiselle but a bit sweeter and a tad bit more woodsy. I think it can be a versatile scent, it's great for fall but also good for warmer weather if you don't apply so much. Overall, I liked it so much that I ordered a bigger bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smell is refreshing, I bought this as a blind buy and it has quickly become one of my favorite go to scents! It last through my entire work day, itu2019s smells great and is not over powering.
Love love love, they did an engraving for me so that made it very special and after having it for almost a year i can say that this perfume is one of the best and one of my favourites!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this perfume. It is unlike any other perfume I have and I have many. Itu2019s beginning, middle and end are delicious and all unique in each Dry down. My complaint is the longevity is terrible. 6 hours before I have to reapply. I am not a spray in every hot spot but this one I did that but still no better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! Immediate love. It smells a bit fruity at first, then floral for 15 minutes, then changes to a spicy-woody-floral (dirty floral) after that. It's a touch masculine yet classy at the same time. It's the perfect signature fragrance for me because I'm not into pink-fluffy-girly-girly...my style is a mix of classy/elegant and sporty. So, I think this perfume goes perfectly with my personality. It reminds me of standing in the desert in the middle of the night and being surrounded by unique florals and sand and woods. This perfume is for all season and all occasions and works both evening and day time. I especially love it for summer, though, because it's carefree yet extremely interesting at the same time.  This is best perfume for daily wear hands-down.   Longevity is beastly, projection is good - someone standing near you can smell it, but it won't fill a room (which is great).

reviews.review_title: SEXY, Sweet..Mysteriously Edgy yet Soft & Sensual
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite perfume, itu2019s sexy, sophisticated, mysterious and has a unique blend of unique essencesu2026i layer it with body butter (unscented) and Nest Turkish Rose Oilu2026for a one two killer combo of deliciousness

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume!! It has a unique scent and makes me feel mature/classy. I wore it on my wedding day. I hope it never gets discontinued!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample. Itu2019s really lovely, it just isnu2019t for me. Smells like a delightful, easy, everyday scent.

reviews.review_title: Beware of the glass vial, VERY breakage prone.
reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This review reflects the glass vial, which bizarrely cracked in two, INSIDE the box, when it accidentally slipped from my hand.The perfume itself smells wonderful and lasts decently long, not all day, but a decent amount of time. However, either Chloe uses incredibly cheap glass, or I received and extremely defective vial. Either way I was not happy as I barely got to use it on holiday, and had been so careful to keep it in its original box to avoid such a mishap.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been become my signature scent. I absolutely love this fragrance. This fragrance is long lasting on me. 10 out of 10 would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I was leaving Spain and at the duty free area I realized I forgot to put on perfume. I saw a Chloe perfume and spritzed it on me, took a picture because I liked the initial scent, then went to wait for an 8 hour flight home. 10 hours later the scent is STILL THERE and strong. I was sold after that, and it sat well on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely my favorite! To me it smells earthy, but not in an over powering way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I first sprayed this on a perfume tester strip at Sephora it smelled strongly like apple pie and I thought it was weird. But, when it started to dry down it really mellowed out and became an opulent, warm, floral scent that really lasted on the strip. I'm ready to try it on me now and see how it goes. But I'm sure I'll still love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this fragrance, it's so soft, feminine, and gorgeous. Like suede, musk, and new paper. Very versatile, it would work for day or night, summer or winter. So sophisticated without being too mature.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this. To me, this has a very sharp, somewhat bitter, extremely unpleasant scent to it, and this was 20 to 30 minutes after spraying. I thought maybe it was just me, so I had my man sniff it. He literally jerked his head back, making a face. When he agreed with my assessment, I asked, So, one star?. He said, I'd give it a minus-one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve never gotten so many compliments on a scent before. Amazing scent and Itu2019s long lasting too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Nah, this one is just okay. Something to wear to work but not anything special that people will want to know what it is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Really love this scent. Itu2019s soft but noticeable. And I love that itu2019s called Nomade because it fits me perfectly

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: No just wasnu2019t for me. Too strong and still didnu2019t last all day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely my scent signature since 2 years ! The smell is INDESCRIPTIBLE.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely adore this fragrance! itu2019s deep and bold, quite strong but it dries down wonderfully and lasts for hours. It does smell slightly masculine upon initial spray but it turns more floral over time. An evolving fragrance that will probably become my daily scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I usually tend to gravitate towards citrus or fresh scents, florals have always smelled like grandma's perfume to me. I got this as a sample and I can't stop smelling my wrist! I'm not getting so much of a floral note, but on me it's picking up more of a peppercorn/woodsy kind of scent.  It's almost on the verge of being masculine but has just enough of a hint of femininity to keep it from crossing that line. Every time I sniff myself I'm like I bet you this is what Rhianna smells like. Definitely purchasing the full size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I smelled and sampled this perfume in the Sephora store and knew I had to have it. Itu2019s an awesome, warm floral scent that can be worn year round and has long lasting power. I switched my signature scent for coco mademoiselle to this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: More mature than the original chloe but just as beautiful!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this smells absolutely bomb and itu2019s not too overpowering and strong itu2019s just right

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite perfumes for warmer months. Fresh, light and clean. Great for summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: While I do quite like this smell, on me it reminds me so much of Harryu2019s brand scent Stone. My husband uses the body wash, and I swear theyu2019re almost identical in scent. I love using the wash because of the scent, and itu2019s interesting to find it here in this high end perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is gorgeous! Floral with a slight sweetness and a beautiful musk base. It smells carefree and luxurious all at the same time. Signature scent for sure. For reference, some of my favorite fragrances are: Chloe by Chloe, Chanel No. 5 Lu2019eau, Bloom by Gucci and Sweet by Ellis Brooklyn.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t usually like floral but this one made me feel expensive my bf also said itu2019s a 10/10 which is amazing cause he always says the others are 8/10 so to finally find a perfume he likes is amazing I love this one

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sexy without trying. This is the girl who paves her own way. Slight sweetness is infiltrated by the adventure of oak moss with blooming flowers. Spring day when the air is crisp.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing ^-^ this is a warm, sweet, floral scent. I think it's really different, in a good way, than other perfumes with this sort of description. I probably would reserve this for nights or the colder seasons since it's warm and somewhat spicy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent, elegant and fresh. Definitely one of my top favourite

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent! I usually wear florals but wanted to try something different and this is perfect. Iu2019ve been wearing it to work and itu2019s a little woodsy but still light and clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't know if its my body chemistry or what. I read all the rave reviews and thought to try it since I like freesia and moss. It doesn't smell bad. its just not for me. I thought its too sweet to my liking and I waited for the dry down but still don't like it. Can't explain the scent on me. Sort of coconut ee and it gives me headache. Also Sephora don't give things for free if not sending them anyway. Not the first time. what a waste of reward points. So disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got a sample in a sephora order, at first spray I thought it was too strong and was turned off... 10 mins later I couldn't stop smelling my wrist and bought it the next day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This smells so good! I can still smell it even after a long day. I asked for a big bottle for Christmas and wear it often!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve smelt this perfume multiple times and always couldnu2019t stand it. Itu2019s very different, strong and had something that I didnu2019t think would be wearable for myself. But THEN, one day, I tried it and fell inlove. Now thereu2019s no turning back. This makes me feel sexy, powerful, like a boss and so delicious. Iu2019ve never had a u201csignature scentu201d but I think this is the most Iu2019ve ever wanted a fragrance to be that to me. I almost want to gatekeep it now so I smell unique LOL. It smells niche! Bravo to Chloe! I donu2019t own any other of their fragrances and donu2019t desire to. This oneu2019s perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: when i first sprayed it on myself it smelled like grass and trees which isnu2019t what i want to smell like so i wasnu2019t loving it. i smelled it about 3 hours later and now iu2019m going to go buy it on saturday. i canu2019t even pinpoint the notes but it smells classy without being mature. itu2019s sweet but not in an artificial pink sugar or prada candy way, but in a very elegant, tolerant way. i think it might be one of my new go tou2019s.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells so divine and complex! Can't stop smelling myself.

reviews.review_title: This is it! I found my SIGNATURE SCENT!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: YouTube prettybreemua made me do it! She is all about sophistication and when I smelled this... this is exactly what I GOT!!! this is all women in their 30s hanging with their girls going out for a nice and lovely dinner. Yes!!!!!! The first honest description of a scent that actually matched!!! If this is you, you need to get this ASAP!

reviews.review_title: Has the performance of a toilette
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice smell however has the performance of a toilette not an eau de parfum which is completely unacceptable at this price point. Does not last on skin or on fabric. This has a very green and mature vibe to it really sad that I canu2019t rate it higher

reviews.review_title: This is a yummy expensive smelling scent!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like it! It was a blind buy. Heard a few ppl raving about it online. So I gave it a go and ordered it. At first I was like itu2019s okay. But as it warmed up on my skin, it smelled absolutely divine. I bought the small spray to try it out. But Iu2019m definitely wanting a larger bottle. It goes so well with my body chemistry. It has that it factor for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Yessss. I love how you can smell allllll the notes, itu2019s. Very sexy and strong but ALSO so dainty at the same time. Iu2019ve never sneed a scent with a mood Nd vibe like this one before.. Iu2019m so impressed because this was a gift for someone else!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly think thereu2019s no point in seeing other peopleu2019s reviews on perfumes. Unless they explain how the notes smell. Perfumes smell different on everyone, and you need to test it yourself. To me, this perfume smells like a warm fruity floral scent. Delicious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite perfume in my collection and I have over 30! This is probably NOT a safe blind buy. You have to try it before you buy it. It works well with my body chemistry and I get a lot of compliments when I wear it. That said, like any other fragrance, you need to understand that what works for one person might not work for another, so the one star reviews are meaningless. I pick up a lot of wood in this fragrance so it can pass off almost as u201cmasculineu201d or maybe unisex to a degree, so that might turn some women off. Itu2019s in the same vein as Chanel Coco Mademoiselle, so if you like that, you might like this too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume. As a native New Yorker living in Toronto, ON; this scent reminds me of a confident woman who is passionate about her life/motherhood/career and is not afraid to say whatu2019s on her mind. She gets the job done with elegance and poise while making men blush. Itu2019s my go-to and definitely gets me in the mood to get out there. But first, an espresso.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample and loved it.definitely a warm/spicy scent andit smells so good. i always get compliments when wearing. 100 percent recommend no doubt.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample and wow love it and so does my husband!! Perfect for everyday wear

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A staple! Can be worn everyday with good lasting power

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best. Smelling. Perfume. Ever.  Long lasting. Nothing much more to say. Best perfume I bought.

reviews.review_title: CHANEL Coco Noir dupe but lighter
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This to me legit smells like coco noir but a lighter more everyday/daytime version.. so in love with this perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately I canu2019t help but think it smells like Raid, the bug killer spray! Itu2019s so strong and not pleasant on me at all. :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Starts off very fresh and citrus-y. The initial scents of mirabelle, bergamot and lemon are very prominent. I got a lot of fressia in the middle and oakmoss and patchouli on the bottom. It's a very subtle scent, only people in an intimate range would notice. Lasts all day long though!
Got it as a sample with another purchase.Loved it and will get a value size!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I smelled this in a magazine and immediately ordered the purse size. Wore it for the first time today and then came home and ordered a larger bottle. I like the way this smells on me. I definitely feel like it is for a mature woman. (I am 52). It's green and woodsy and masculine.....not a girly girl perfume. I didn't get any feedback from anyone while wearing it, but I liked the way I felt wearing it and that is good enough for me.

My goodness how in this world does this have any ratings above 1 star?! Downright shocking! I got a tester of something that I thought was this. I loved the tester and proceeded to order this. I may have gotten a bad batch? But it smelled like CHEAP AFTERSHAVE! What!! I wouldnu2019t even want to smell this on my husband. And I couldnu2019t wash it off. I thought I was going to vomit- no Iu2019m not exaggerating. Oh well- nice try but no!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thanks to Anna at the Perfume counter of the Downtown Montreal Sephora, I now have a new, and terribly me, signature scent! This scent is warm and spicy, feminine and strong, sophisticated and daring. The projection is just the right distance and the wear time seems to be easily a day. I wasn't entirely sure of its daytime wear aspect in the heatwave, but in normal heat, I've felt completely comfortable with it. I actually think this perfume is giving me more confidence. Have not yet worn it at the office (telework oblige) but I cannot wait to see if I'd get any feedback. Among friends and family? 100% approuved.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Warm & spicy and the dry down is sweet almost powdery. Great projection and wear time. Signature scent worthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells very sophisticated and dries down wonderfully

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this scent! I'm in my 40's and I like something feminine but classy. Whenever I put this on, my family loves it. My children say I smell so good and my husband won't leave me alone! ;) This scent works for going into the office AND date night. It's sexy, fresh, and screams WOMAN. Slightly sweet, but sensual too. It's my new signature scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was hoping for a earthy but feminine scent, with lots of patchouli. Unfortunately, this was not what I was looking for. To me it smelled like a mans cologne. It was too musky and spicy for my taste. My 7 year old daughter loved it though. I can see how some women might love this, but I ended up returning it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I chose this perfume as one of my samples with a purchase. As soon as I sprayed it, my partner asked me what perfume I was wearing. His reaction made me realize just how beautiful of a scent it is! Itu2019s simple, clean, and a very u201cprettyu201d scent. Throughout the day it lasted well, and Iu2019m extremely impressed overall!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: bought the travel spray to try out the scent, i love this perfume! Smells amazing! need a full size!

reviews.review_title: Lush Store meets Saks Fifth Avenue
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first spritz, it smelled like a very high-end department store, a little aggressive and very rich. I was confused because the vibe of this perfume seemed to be more free spirited. Then it dried down and I am absolutely in love. Whoever said it smelled like the inside of a Lush store was completely right, but less cloying fruity sweet and more sophisticated. I was the biggest fan of See by Chloe before they discontinued it, and something underlying in here is a bit reminiscent of that. Somehow sophisticated but fresh and nomadic as the name says. I get very clean floral with a warm (not super woody) base note and a hint of fruitiness. Will be buying the large size when I run out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: it smells like the inside of a LUSH store, love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: the best way l can describe it is that it smells like the inside of a LUSH store

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this product!!! I get so many compliments and love having a unique scent. High recommend!

reviews.review_title: it smells sweet and a little spicy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like Iu2019m sophisticated and sexy when I wear this perfume

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new signature scent!! I got it as a sample and fell in love! I wasnu2019t expecting much from it because I dislike the original Chloe, but this is so different from what I was expecting! Itu2019s fruity, floral, woody and musky on my skin and honestly so perfect for any season. The bottle is to beautiful too! Definitely get this perfume itu2019s so amazing!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: u2764u2764u2764u2764u2764I recvd this parfum as a free sample....I ended buying it.u2764u2764u2764u2764u2764

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent for the fall. Iu2019m 54 and usually like florals. This is a musky floral a rent which I normally wouldnu2019t like. I received a sample and had to go buy the full size. I will purchase again and again!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love original Chloe, and I liked this when I smelled it in store, but now that I'm wearing this it is reminding me of something my mother or grandmother would have worn in the 70's.  It does have a green note in it I am liking, so I'm not going to put this away just yet, but my initial impression is blech.   It's mature, and maybe old is new again.  I think my memory is longer than most of the reviewers here, and I don't want to smell like an 82 year old.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only Chloe scent I like and thereu2019s something really special about it in my opinion. Itu2019s a floral for sure and I find it very feminine and pleasant but thereu2019s a spiciness to it that makes it unique. Itu2019s not sugary sweet or powdery, so if thatu2019s the kind of perfume you like, donu2019t go for this.   The base has sandalwood, patchouli, oak moss and amber wood, so it dries down nice and cozy after the spicy floral/citrusy opening. Lasting power is very good on me, definitely a forever scent in my collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume has been my go-to for years now. I absolutely love the scent. I only need one spray and itu2019ll last the entire day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The greatest scent from Chloe. Every time I wear it, I get nothing but non stop compliments. It is strong so you will not need very much.

reviews.review_title: One of my favorite scents ever
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone
reviews.review_text: For some weird, unexplainable reason I have always wanted to try this scent. I gave in so...maybe itu2019s my destiny? My new signature scent? I donu2019t buy new fragrances often. I love the classic vanilla scent from VS, Tom Fordu2019s Santal Blush, and Aerinu2019s Amber (just so you get an idea of scents I like). I like vanilla, warm, spicy scents. Even leather and mandarin/orange are okay. You get the point. I was afraid to try this scent because of the oak moss note mentioned in the description. Iu2019m not totally into earthy scents, but this scent is so much MORE than that. Itu2019s so beautiful on me! Itu2019s warm, slightly sweet, and floral, but not too floral. You smell a little bit of earthy but I donu2019t mind. When people smell it on me they really like it. Also, FYI: I purchased Chloeu2019s original scent before purchasing this one (thinking it would be a safe choice) and how I was so wrong. The original is a lovely scent for summer, very floral, but this one is next level. So if youu2019re unsure, just try it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Remember those cheap department store perfume? This smells just as overpowering and headache inducing as that. I've gotten the trial size and trust me, I wanted to love it because of the brand name.This just makes me dread using up the little 1.5ml vial I have because of its strongly scented smell.This showy, lacking in substance smell isn't my style

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I canu2019t rave enough about this fragrance. It reminds me of chance eau tendre by Chanel, only a more sophisticated version. I used to wear eau tendre, but being in my late twenties, I started to get the feeling it was too young for me.  Nomade kind of smells like eau tendre but more Woody, earthy and musky with a bit of spice to it. Itu2019s the perfect alternative for a more mature and womanly scent. I think every woman should own a Chloe fragrance. There is something about this fragrance family that is so classy, sophisticated, yet womanly. Nomade is not powdery, and not soapy. Itu2019s a staple in my perfume collection that I plan on repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an absolutely beautiful scent. Very long lasting and a little goes a long way. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok I love this perfume BUT only when I use it in between 2 sprays of the original chloe. I just finished leaving a review for the original but I had neglected to mention that I had spritzed 1 or 2 sprays with it and that had made a big difference in my experience.  This perfume has a lighter more citrusy smell to it without sacrificing florals and even a hint of a masculine warm scent. Now combine it with Chloe and holy cow youu2019ve got a winning combo. I should have mentioned it in my review for the original Chloe but I honestly thought at the time I was only smelling Chloe. I did another smell test and I was so wrong. Honestly this perfume is good on its own, as is Chloe, but the smell that I really couldnu2019t resist (and my husband) was the combination of the two. I had received a small sample of each in a previous order. Now, because I love the combo so much, I am seriously contemplating getting a full size bottle of each. I took one star off because the scent alone isnu2019t something Iu2019d wear on its own. Lasting power is over 8 hours. I wear perfume to bed and when I woke up I could still smell this beautiful perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my signature scent. It's floral but not in a traditional way. It has a depth to it, slightly mossy in a good way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best perfumes Iu2019ve ever tried! The scent is a little overpowering so you donu2019t need to put as much as you would with other perfume. The scent is very floral and I love it, I received so many compliments the first time I tried it on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance smells so good. Its kind of sweet and powdery. It lasts a long time too. Chloe did a great job picking this mix of ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: amazing scent. it has a nice floral scent for people who donu2019t love florals. it is like a warmer toned version of mark jacobs daisy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells amazing but boy, itu2019s overpowering!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent! Very classy! My favorite new fragrance since the first time I smelled a sample.

reviews.review_title: Maybe for you but not for me.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m usually not into warm and spicy scents but I thought maybe this one would change my mind. It was a blind buy and sadly, it definitely wasnu2019t for me. Iu2019m more into citrusy, fresh, sweet, florals. This one on me smelled earthy, woody, warm, and spicy. And although, thereu2019s a little bit of fruity notes and citrus notes, I canu2019t seem to smell it at all. Iu2019d say that if youu2019re into oud type of scents, youu2019ll really like this one. Or if youu2019re really into fragrances like Black Opium, (which I am also not a fan of) I think youu2019ll be a fan of this as well. Iu2019d also consider this more of a mature perfume.  Maybe someone in their late 20s going into their 30s. Definitely takes a certain woman of a particular age to pull this off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely my favorite perfume. Lasts all day and the only perfume I regularly receive compliments on!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like the original Chloe OK (although I havenu2019t worn it myself, itu2019s my momu2019s favorite)... but itu2019s hard to describe this scent except that it smells like must and dustu2014almost mold-like on me. It does have a lot of staying power, though, as I canu2019t seem to get the scent off of my skin. Maybe itu2019ll smell better on my mom with her chemistry. But with mine, it reminds me of cleaning out my grandmotheru2019s closet after her death and smelling what once was great perfume on her dresses turned rancid.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received a sample of this perfume and loved it. I now ordered the bigger bottle. It is a mature warm sweet scent

reviews.review_title: my signature scent! can't live without her
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nomade is somehow sweet and spicy, fresh and warm all at the same time. The woody notes are the strongest for me; however, I'm not getting oakmoss like many others are. I'm getting something evergreen instead, like cedar or maybe pine? The fruity and floral notes pair with it well, especially the mirabelle and citrus. The peach notes peak out a bit too, but in my opinion aren't very noticeable.  It's great for any season, but it really blossoms in the cold and gives me such happy memories of winter. Well-composed, comforting, and sensual. I'm planning on keeping Nomade around for a very long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this fragrance so so much it is one of my favorites! It lasts a very long time, as a waitress I get so much compliments on it! Make sure you buy the eau de parfum and not the toilette cause it does come in both, if your wanting a more intense/long lasting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love love the smell. This is the only parfume that I use for 3 years. I have the big size in my home and I carry the mini in my purse. I donu2019t like strong, flowery scents. This one is great for everyday use. This is my signature scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I think this smells similar to the original Chloe only not as floral. It's a nice soft scent good for day and night. I feel this is a better choice for the fall and winter seasons than the original which feels like more like summer and spring to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve never smelled anything like this in my life. The first time I smelled this I told my husband this smells like cologne and right out of the bottle it can. I decided to give it a try a gave a little spritz on my chest and went about my day. When I tell you that on my skin it developed into something so warm, exotic and unique! And everyone that stuck their head in my office said it smells good. I would definitely consider this a mature perfume but not in a stuffy or stinky way we normally associate with mature smelling perfumes. A little goes a long way and your body heat develops the scent so be sure not to just spritz in air and walk thru. You will not have to reapply. And this could definitely be unisex

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The little sample I got made me fall in love with the warm and feminine scent of Chloe Nomade. It was chic, subtle, and stayed on my skin all day. I bought the travel spray because I loved the scent so much. The scent doesnu2019t smell as warm and is stronger and more pungent. The spray part of the bottle also doesnu2019t work properly so the perfume runs down the side of the bottle instead of spraying out. I will be waiting until I use my other travel spray perfume to change this perfume into a different bottle. Iu2019m not disappointed but for the price I was expecting more consistent quality...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This would be the PERFECT perfume for me if it was long lasting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok I donu2019t know the first thing about perfumes...like how does everyone here know what oak wood(?) and bergamot (??) smell like??  Hereu2019s what Iu2019ll say about this perfume.  It is for ~cool~ people. For sure.  Itu2019s feminine with a hint of boy-ishness.  It makes me feel like my arms look good in a tank top.  It makes me want to go on Refinery 29 and call myself a u201cgirl bossu201d. It makes me feel like I had a promising future in finance but I left that job to pursue my passion of woodworking.  It makes me feel a lot of things that are great in theory, just not for me. But in doing so, it makes me feel like a woman that just...knows what sheu2019s doing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this perfume after a friend recommended it. The first time I tried it in summer I immediately thought it was awful and smelled like something for old ladies. Fast forward to winter and I gave it another try and for some reason it smells so much better! Itu2019s warm and spicy with a woody top note and a citrus and fruity heart, followed by a powdery amber finish. Itu2019s now become my top favourite perfume! Iu2019ve been wearing it all fall and my only regret is that I didnu2019t get a bigger bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice warm floral scent. It is more of mature classy scent (but not in a grandma way and not in a bad way) I feel like this would be perfect for someone in their 20s and older. It's the perfect mix of a strong perfume and a light one at the same time. It is very sophisticated, elegant, classy and girly and it lasts about 8 hours on the skin. When i smell this perfume i think about a women that is classy and  that is always well put togheter. Would recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have a sample of this and I love it, Iu2019m definitely considering buying the full size. Itu2019s a really lovely mature scent, floral, and a whisper of spice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this fragrance. It's a soft, lingering, delicate, fresh, fruity, floral scent with my body chemistry. Received a ton of compliments from strangers and loved ones regularly when I wore this out and about pre pandemic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow ce parfum a une odeur magnifique!  Tres feminin, doux ! Ju2019adore . En plus il dure toute la journee

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve receive two samples of this in two purchases and I love it. Itu2019s a lovely floral musky scent that softens and lasts a long time on me. I just received a third sample that I will (reluctantly) pass on to my sonu2019s partner, who also loves floral scents!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample and now I carry it with me in my purse ! It lasts a long time and I find the scent floral, with a bit of warmth spice to it. Itu2019s a strong scent but not too over powering ! I also find this a more mature scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: recommend if you want to smell like an old woman! if not, itu2019s a hard pass. this stuff is way way too strong and geriatric smelling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smells almost masculine, but in a good way... the floral is definitely noticeable and it has good staying power and isn't too pungent. Its classy without being too mature/old lady like...definitely would wear on a date night or going out somewhere because it's not something I would wear every day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume. Normally I wear Chanel mademoiselle. But I fell in LOVE with this. My top two favorite perfumes. This gives off radiant boss lady energy. I receive compliments all day when I wear this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is hard to describe, I an a big fan of florals and musk scents. I also have Chloe Love story and the Original Chloe. Both are wonderful florals however this one is different. Its warmer, less floral, more musky, woodsy. Feels like such a fresh fall scent. Warm and sensual. For reference I am a 24 year old woman, some my other favourite perfumes are Jo Malone Blackberry & Bay, Nest Indigo, Clean Nectar, Replica Jazz Club.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: got a sample for this and had to get the full size IMMEDIATELY. itu2019s now my bfu2019s fave scent on me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample with one of my Sephora orders and the first time I smelled it, I knew it wasnu2019t for me. Itu2019s a REALLY strong floral scent that reminds me of a perfume my grandmother used to wear - it has that kind of an u201colderu201d feminine smell to it. As a 22 year old who isnu2019t big on floral scents anyway, this isnu2019t perfume for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Didnu2019t really like the smell. Has this warm cinnamon scent that I really didnu2019t like. Iu2019m a Versace bright crystal girl so this was kind of too warm for me and not that much floral.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If youu2019re thinking of getting it this is your sign GET IT . Itu2019s literally the best fragrance.

reviews.review_text: I picked up this perfume in the winter of 2018 and I've been wearing it ever since, switching with Balenciaga's Florabotanica when the weather is warmer. I do enjoy freesia too, and I love how the scent matures through the combination with the oakmoss and makes for a youthful but elegant fragrance.

Pros:  -beautiful pink hue -sweet floral -warmly fresh -subtle and gentle -the full size bottle is adorable (packaging matters!)  Cons: -the price tag may put people off

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh my goodness the Nomade scent by Chloe is outstanding. Iu2019m highly picky when it comes to perfume scentsu2014I have a very strong sense of smell and can smell things from far distances. The one thing I always want to test out in frangrances is how the scent changes from the initial spray and to the end of the day after wearing it for a good 10 hours. I have to say this is so pleasant and light on the nose. The floral is not quite as strong but it sort of floats above the earthy tones to balance out the sweetness. I tend to prefer scents that have a hint of musk without noticing it. I spent 30 mins at the Sephora store as well and tried all the Chloe perfumes (among others) side by side. This one is the least sweet smelling but still very feminine. Iu2019m in my early 30s and I think itu2019s the perfect scent for me to wear to work. My husband also goes crazy when I wear this... in bed ;).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A very different scent than the original. Modern and fresh. Lasts on the skin but not overpowering! Definite recommendation!

reviews.review_text: Whenever looking for a new perfume, I sniff for unique out-of-the-ordinary scents. This definitely fits in that category. It is nothing like I've ever had. It's sophisticated, spicy, warm, and exotic. It's definitely more on the masculine side rather than feminine, which I personally love. It's extremely powerful so I only use one to two spritzes, which last all day. If you're into non-traditional and somewhat cologne-ish scents, you will probably love this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Chypre! I have always loved frangaces from this family. From Mitsouko, Chanel #19, Giorgio, Enjoli.... I thought I'd never find another when all the formulas changed because of the Europe's suggestion of not adding oakmoss (or reducing it greatly). But, I found two that I love; Chloe Nomad and Cartier La Panthere (ever single version, though the original is my favorite). Nomad for daytime wear (just be careful with amount! Although the sillage is moderate, the fragrance can be strong).  I do love it, and will be buying a full bottle soon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells heavenly! I get so many compliments when I wear this! I have both Chloe scents and while I thought I loved the original most, this one takes the cake. Must have!!

I love this scent! I wouldn't call it much of a floral, but more warm and a bit musky, which I prefer. I have used the original Chloe, which seemed to disappear very shortly, where this I stays all day. I totally get it's not for everyone, but I was pleasantly surprised.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: u201cThis is what they mean by an aphrodisiac.u201d - my husband as he smells this on me for the first time and it only got better from there. As for the perfume itself, I was a life long Coco Mademoiselle diehard and nothing had shaken it. Sure, some perfumes were pretty but nothing really took the cake like Coco did until I got a sample of this. Typically I just toss these aside and give them to my niece or Iu2019ll throw one in the gym bag to help on a really sweaty day, but I seldom even smell them ahead of time. Just out of sheer happenstance this bottleu2019s trigger was depressed sometime during packing or shipping and it was lightly sprayed on the packaging paper. It wasnu2019t much dispensed either because the sample was still full, but that tiny bit instantly peeked my interest. It was warm like a cedar, floral enough to have distinct femininity, but thereu2019s also something deep that (literally if youu2019re my husband) keeps you wanting to smell it more and more. I donu2019t think Iu2019d ever see this day, but I am now a Chloe Nomade convert.

I came into the office, and I got some feedback from coworkers - they say it's nice, but not 'me'... I'm 39, and they say it smells like an older woman's perfume. So I'm unsure about keeping it. I will say, this is more of a winter scent, very modern and minimalist, but not a fresh summery scent at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m in LOVE with this fragrance. Every time I go in to sephora I go and smell/try this on. The scent is very unique and not like most of Chloeu2019s other rose-forward scents.  I had to look up what a chypre perfume was just to get a better understanding. To me I can smell the mossy earthy (chypre) scent but I can also smell peaches (Iu2019m guessing thats the mirabelle plumb?) I also smell spice (like cinnamon/nutmeg spice not an oriental fragrance spice). The dry down is a little more powdery-floral. Basically is starts out bold and fun then dries down to a powdery romantic scent.  Iu2019ve read lots of different reviews where some people got a smokey scent or a really heavy powder scent so you might want to try it on for a few hours before you buy!

Once it dries down, it is cloying, nauseating and headache inducing. I feel like I smell like someoneu2019s grandmother in 1940. It is not for everyone and this is NOT a blind buy. Make sure you test it ask for a sample or maybe 2 before buying!!

reviews.review_text: This is my new go-to scent!!! At first spray, it comes off a little strong, if not a little spicy. After a few minutes, it softens up and it smells so lovely and subtle. It is both light but warm and cozy, with a very soft floral scent. No sweet, cloying, or overly perfume-y smell. Very classy. No headaches either! It doesn't last quite as long as other perfumes, but the scent is nice enough that I don't mind reapplying midday. I've gotten several compliments from people who ended up buying this after smelling it on me. These same people didn't like the scent initially when I showed them my new purchase, but later on, when I was wearing it, they asked what I was wearing. If you're trying this out at the store, give it a few minutes to settle and don't judge the scent right away!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a parfume addict, but I haven't found my signature perfume - the one that people remember you by, the one that you get it goes perfect with you, it fits your personality compliments for) until I was 32 (sigh). Of course, it turned out to be a limited 2014. edition of Light Blue (Escape to Panarea), and it's almost nowhere to be found. This is easily going to be my new signature day scent (along with nighttime Bvlgari Jasmin Noir), and it fits my personality, as well :)   I cannot describe the scent, because I don't care about the fragrance groups (incidentally, though, I abhor too heavy sweet parfumes such as Mugler's Angel, or aldehydes like Chanel No. 5), and most of the parfumes I had and liked weren't similar - some would be citrusy (Light Blue), some citrusy-woody (John Richmond, original scent) some powdery/clean (Chloe Love), only one with jasmine (Bvlgari Jasmin Noir, my perfect evening parfume), some floral (Boss Femme, original scent - is that floral?), some oriental (Givenchy Organza) and almost none with rose. For me, it is important that a parfume has the good quality ingredients which are well-composed (like the only jasmine-based I liked so far, mentioned above), that is sofisticated, and that it has that unique je ne sais quoi that will draw me to it. Nomade is all that, and more.  Also, I don't know why are people complaining about the lasting power - I sprayed the sample I got on myself and my top-layer sweater, and I could still smell it on the sweater the day after! Certainly lasts way longer than most of the parfumes I tried and had!   All in all, if you're a tomboy type of girl and a free, travelling, tree-hugging spirit, this is a fragrance for you :) I certainly can't wait to get mine!

I think the main thing for me is that it just doesn't smell that special compared to a zillion other traditional department store perfumes. I'll probably use my sample up, but I'd never buy it. reviews.review_title: Surprised by how great this is...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Received a free sample of this with my last order and was not expecting much (I've never really *loved* a Chloe scent before) but this might be my favourite fragrance release of 2018 so far. Intensely fruity/ripe, juicy citrus but not at all sweet on the opening and the drydown - I never expect much on the drydown from these big brand name scents, they all seem to settle into basically the same bland vanilla-musk powdery sweetness. Drydown on this is beautiful. Nothing avant-garde going on here but it's just better than what I'm used to, there's some plum in there, teeny bit of powder, softness, sweetness but just a tinge, sexiness but not the overt kind. Just A   on the drydown. Well done to Chloe on this one - it's suitable for the office/daytime and it's genuinely lovely.

reviews.review_text: I've found this perfume to be very unique for a women's perfume. It actually smells like a floral and slightly powdery version of men's Burberry London. It's strange, slightly sharp, somewhat spicy yet powdery, and the softness and pastel of the bottle are visually misleading in just how masculine the overall smell is. The boldness and masculine tones do fade after about 1-2 hours, and it settles into a powdery smell that reminds me more of a clean floral soap with Earl Grey (bergamot) notes. I've owned spray bottles and rollerballs of Chloe, Chloe Love Story, and Chloe Fleur de Parfum before and expected a similar floral feminine scent from this new release. I was very pleasantly surprised by how unique this smell turned out to be! It's turned out to be my absolute favorite of the line so far.
