reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with the smell. Not sweet and very different. Has a different smell ...similar to light blue by DG. On me personally, it doesnu2019t stay on as long as some other perfumes though, but I am still in love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This reads very masculine on me. I know that many scents have a unisex vibe and that they are very much in vogue with younger folks. I'm also sure that there are women my age - 53 - who could pull this off as well. But when it comes to perfume, I am unabashedly feminine. I want to smell and feel pretty, seductive, and sophisticated. I do not get that from this perfume. My husband did not care for it on me either, but liked it as a masculine fragrance, so I gave him the few samples I had and he will wear it. I'm sure others will love it, but for me, it's a giant No!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: if you love the scent family of chloe, you will love this. a bit warmer and muskie yet still light feminine, sexy and modern. Perfect for everyday.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am not really a fan

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you're tired of the same predictable scents out there, you should sample this product bc it's surprisingly unique. The initial spray smells so wonderful but I'm not too sure im loving the dry down scent. I highly recommend you pick up a sample to see how it wears through out the day. As a perfume junkie, I've learned that a perfume should be tried out for a day or two bc the scent changes  through out the day. Just a little advice before forking over your hard earned cash.

reviews.review_title: not floral so not a fan
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m a floral girl all the way and this did not seem floral  at all to me. I love Chloe de Roses and it might be my favorite of all time. This reminded me of my husbandu2019s Axe products, so I all smelled was masculine. And thatu2019s sort of the total opposite of floral. I was intrigued when this came out so Iu2019m glad I just tested a free sample, as soon as I sprayed itu2014 I regretted it. Itu2019s not horrible by any means, itu2019s not just my style. Iu2019m not going to pretend like Iu2019m good at explaining scents so I wonu2019t try. Just if youu2019re like me and love florals (roses, peonies, white flowers, honeysuckle, etc) then you most likely will not enjoy this one. Also, I didnu2019t smell it on me later so it might not last very long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Chloe never seems to disappoint. Chloe's original is my signature scent. I got to try Nomade via a magazine insert and immediately added it to my Sephora's Favorites. When I first saw the description of oakmoss, freesia, Mirabelle (plum) liquor, it didn't excite me. Smelling it though, I got to appreciate the uniqueness of this combination. The contrasting notes all play beautifully well together.  This truly is a scent for the free-spirited. It's not in your face that it's rebellious. It's subtle and hints at the complex but feminine nature of the wearer. Suits me perfectly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of CHOLu00c9 Nomade. I did not have high expectations. I generally do not like floral scents and in the past had disliked the other scents CHLOu00c9 offers. Nomade changed my mind. While it is a floral scent, it has a warmness to it and took to my chemistry rather well. The other fragrance offerings have such oppressive character to their scents. This is light, yet has depth; it promises to not be a headache in a bottle. There is nothing offensive about the scent.

reviews.review_title: new favorite in a large perfume collection
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is amazing. I have found myself reaching for this daily since I got it, and have received a ton of compliments. I find it to be perfect for spring/summer, and I've worn it to work and to go out. I love it for any occasion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm kind of a fragrance junkie and its been a long time since I smelled something truly different.  Very hard to describe - not particularly sweet or flowery, maybe a little musky but not overly so.  Its a very unique, intoxicating fragrance that lasts all day on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Clean, addictive, always want to put on more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is unlike any other Chloe perfume.

reviews.review_title: Stronger but Does Not Irritate My Allergies
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful perfume. It does have a stronger smell, but does not irritate my allergies. I does not linger all day, it will need reapplied in a few hours. I requested this with an order and did not receive the sample so the young lady in store made me one when I purchased my lipstick. I'm so glad I asked in store because this perfume is quite lovely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this scent. Planning on buying the big bottle after I get through this little one

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Light. Great scent for ther warmer months

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: great smell. just enough to travel with real easy to use with the cap so the perfume doesn't get everywhere on other things in the bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this is my play box last month and it is now my favorite scent. It replaced my Elizabeth and James Rose as my top scent. It lasts which is a huge issue for me when it comes to perfume. Perfect balance of floral and earthy/musky

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Devine floral scent. Iu2019m in love

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not only is this travel size convenient in size, I love that it's a spray vs. roller ball. This scent is tasteful, just a hint of sweet, floral and professional. I love it, I will be purchasing the full bottle. You won't regret the purchase!

reviews.review_title: Just right - green, soft, fruit, floral, spice
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am probably not the typical Chloe customer.  I don't love florals and I don't love rose.  I do love this.  I took a chance based on the description and (also the cute gift with purchase). This is really lovely.  It's not demure and it's not overly floral.  Its fruity, tart, green, a little spicy, and soft.  It's really nice balance and blend that's not too young, and certainly not too old.  If you want something a little different - not so sweet, but not a big flower - this is perfect.  I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This smells so delicious, itu2019s gentle and sexy. Smells sweet and has a hint of musk. It lasts for a very long time and receive compliments every time I wear this. I like perfumes that smell like they can be unisex and this is just fantastic ! My favorite so far !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recently received Chloe Nomade as a sample at an event at Sephora. This is the first time I try this scent and I'm glad I did.  I first noticed it had floral notes of Oakmoss and Freesia. It's long lasting. I defenitely will be purchasing this fragrance again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a lovely and original scent. I love it. It smells a little like fresh basil, not in a pesto way but a creamy fresh spicy greenness mixed with other notes. This is my new favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I adore this perfume. It has a very noticeable dry down from a very spicy scent to more of a floral with spicy slightly musky undertones. On my skin it wears very unique from other perfumes I have tried. 2 sprays total is enough for a substantial yet still subtle scent payoff. The fragrance lasts most of the day though it becomes substantially less notable after 5 or so hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is so complex, it starts off a little too sweet for my taste. But i am willing to wait it out, because the scent that develops on the skin is musky and delicate, with a touch of fresh flowers. The first time i wore it people kept telling me i smelt incredible. This perfume is long lasting (and perfumes don't normally last on me)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I appreciate Chloe going in a different direction from the usual pink bubblegum or fruitchouli scents that flood the women's fragrance market, but I can honestly say that this scent lets me know without a doubt that I hate oakmoss.  The other notes are nice and I can detect them, but the oakmoss is overpowering and makes this smell old and dated, like a vintage bottle that's been sitting around in an attic for decades.  A definite pass for me, but as I said, I do give props to Chloe for trying something new!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this smell!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Can't stop smelling my wrist - it's so good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I thought based on the notes that I would really like this, but itu2019s just too heavy. The scent itself is very fresh, but the undertone of it gave me a headache.

reviews.review_title: Interesting smell as it dries down, in a good way
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is not as long lasting as the original Chloe perfume. Itu2019s a very nice scent but a little too autumnal for the summertime. It smells mature - something you might like to wear in the office. Not overtly floral, Nomade has a faintly salty tang to it as it lingers on the skin and hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this fragrance. It lasts forever and makes me feel sexy and invincible. I wear it on days when I have an important meeting or presentation and want to feel like a boss. Itu2019s subtle but really lovely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I went in to buy a specific perfume but as one does.... I started looking at what was out there and let my eyes wander. One of the associates was helping me and introduced this perfume to me. And after some inner debating with myself i walked out the door with this product vs the one I initially came in to purchase. I should add that this is a similar price point to my original one (a little pricey but WELL worth it!). I love how this smells on me and how it keeps throughout the day. Overall VERY happy!

reviews.review_title: Pretty for Spring Summer, but Fall too.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really nice fragrance with beautiful notes. There is a floral element to it but it is balanced with deeper muskier notes. As with all fragrances, try before you buy. Spray on your skin and walk around for a while and see how it develops. I also spray an item of clothing and check that too after a while. If it gives you that ah moment, it's a keeper. I'm very picky with fragrance and this is the first time a fragrance has intrigued me. I tend to stick with my tried and true, forever love, all year round fragrance - chanel mademoiselle. This is a nice switch up from that.    If you're looking at the gift with purchase - it is nothing as pictured. Different color, shape and cheap looking. If you're a minimalist skip it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely adore this perfume! Iu2019m a perfume junkie but this one is adored by everyone - even my mom who is really sensitive to perfume and typically hates all of them (she loved this one). People literally stop me to ask me what perfume Iu2019m wearing. Couldnu2019t recommend this enough. I put 4 stars out of 5 because nothing can beat my favourite perfume (Si by Giorgio Armani) but this one comes close.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this sweet perfume! Something different for Spring!

reviews.review_title: Always get compliments; feminine and sweet
reviews.review_text: I have gotten so many compliments wearing this scent! Almost anytime I go out with it, someone mentions it. I've loved Dolce

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent. It just lingers in the most delicious way...

reviews.review_title: Gimme a gallon of this stuff!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loooooove! I smelled a sample in a magazine and instantly fell in love. Kind of smells like a girl version of a guys cologne if that makes any sense? Like a fresh, clean smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Sampled this yesterday and had to buy it! Itu2019s a really unique fragrance - a little flowery, a little soapy - a good mix of masculine and feminine. It dries down a touch powdery which isnu2019t always my favorite but itu2019s not overwhelming. I bought a small rollerball/purse spray size to see if itu2019s just a summer spray or more of a long term scent for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it!  This last long as well. I couldnu2019t believe that this is Chloe perfume. I think this is one of my best for 2018!   Hopefully they wonu2019t change any formula. Great buy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I don't write reviews, but felt compelled to do so for this fragrance.  When I first spray it, it's a bit floral for my taste, but after about an hour, it has a nice musk to it.  It's soft and sexy and not overpowering.  I find it to be very warm and comforting.  I have NEVER worn perfume because it gives me a headache and makes me sneeze like crazy, but this does neither.  How a fragrance smells definitely depends on the person, but this one works well with my body chemistry and my sensitive nose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a huge fan of all Chloe perfumes but not this one... To me this smells like the soap and glory body lotion which is a drug store brand. For this price I was expecting something more sophisticated. I ended up returning it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: WOW. just WOW! this scent is absolutely amazing... so unique and mysterious! im normally into sweet, floral scents but this just stole my heart! I hope it will be made into a lotion! AND a gift set! I need it all!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I went to the store during the VIB sale and had a wonderful employee help me pick out a new perfume. I love floral notes but hate many the popular floral fragrances because they are overpowering. This is the perfect mix between floral, sultry, and warm. I've had perfumes with better staying power but this one isn't too bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This smells NOTHING like the other perfumes! I love woody musky smells and this is it! I normally donu2019t buy perfumes but I HAD to buy this one! I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It's love at first smell for me. I have to admit that I'm a fan of all Chloe line and this perfume is a nice new addition. The scent is very bright and assertive. I wouldn't call it a pure floral perfume. Maybe it's just my skin, but fruity liquor notes (orange, mango?) become more pronounced in the dry down. Overall it's a very playful optimistic scent. I bought a travel size. Thinking about going back for more at some point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! The bottle is stunning, and the scent is unlike anything I have in my collection, including the original Chloe. It's a fresh floral that's easy to wear, care-free, so very Chloe-esque. I will always take a star off Chloe fragrances for being overpriced and smaller in size than other designer perfumes. Thankful for VIB rouge sales!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great scent for spring but I excited to smell it in the warm summer air.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For reference- my current favorite scents are Elizabeth and James Nirvana Black and Michael Kors Sexy Ruby. This perfume is absolutely intoxicating and definitely multi-seasonal. At first, I smelled anise and flowers- making it perfect for spring and summer, then the after-scent was minty and warm (?difficult to describe?) and it reminded me of a wintry cocktail and I realized it was perfect for all seasons. Definitely one of my favorite perfumes on the market.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very strong perfume. I love all the classic, light and rose Cloe, but this one is a miss for me. It has a very nice smell, but simply too strong for me.
Loved this in the store however after ordering a small travel bottle, I find it to fade way too quickly

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s funny how perfumes smell different to different people. For me this doesnu2019t smell like a floral at all. It smells like an incredibly sweet perfume, almost fruity in a way. But itu2019s a very sophisticated sweet. I fell in love the first time I smelled it, and it wore super well on my skin. Itu2019s hard to describe but itu2019s definitely worth giving a try the next time youu2019re in Sephora. This is one of those rare perfumes that took me by surprise and that I knew I needed to have in my collection immediately (although itu2019s so close to the sale that if youu2019re going to buy it Iu2019d suggest waiting.) absolutely love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This isn't an in your face bold scent, it's very light and subtle, one that's best smelled when someone's standing very close to you.  I've been wearing it and every time someone gets close enough, I get asked what that beautiful, light perfume is.  In love!

reviews.review_title: Love this scent will always repurchaseu2764ufe0f
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love it.. The gentleman at my Sephora store is an absolute sweetheart he's always helping me and telling me about the products I purchase. He suggested this one after telling him that in love the original Chloe.. This last all day and I work for the post office and I still smell sweet and fresh after a long day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am extremely choosy when it comes to fragrance. This perfume smells delicious! I like to describe it as grown up fruity it reminds me of guava and tropical flowers but in a very sexy and grown up way. Perfect for the summer! I purchased the purse spray to try it and will be buying the full sized bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you Chole for Nomade!  I enjoy the wearing this perfume and have gotton several compliments.  I love Rollerballs so portable and great way to try a fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! My new favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent. Very balanced and not too powdery, which I find (but don't take issue with) most Chloe scents. Perfect for spring and even summer. Definitely will purchase the full size of this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m in love with this scent! It is sexy and elegant and it last for a long tine on my skin. Very happy my hubby got this perfume for my birthday.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I just bought this today and itu2019s already my favorite parfum from Chloe. I owned love story but I ran out. Therefore, I wanted to try the new one, and Iu2019m in love with it. I love floral scents and this one is definitely floral. It smelled so good on me, I couldnu2019t resist buying. I recommend spraying it on your wrists before purchasing. Parfums smell different on everyone! If youu2019re a fan of floral and Chloe, I think youu2019ll like this sweet floral scent. Also the lotion smells amazing as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this scent. Everywhere I go someone compliments me or ask what am I wearing. Such a light clean scent.

reviews.review_title: I almost turn myself on when I wear this.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the most incredible, sexiest perfume.  A heavenly, woodsy, sultry, slightly floral, spicy, sophisticated, beautiful scent.  I am in love.  I can't imagine a future where I will not have this perfume as my daily scent, or at very least, as a main staple in my lineup.  There is something pared-down and simple, yet completely mysterious and complex about this perfume.  It makes you feel like an Amazonian huntress that somehow ended up in the desert.  Okay, dramatic, but true.  Absolute love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy wearing this new fragrance. It stays on the skin all day and it's not overbearing or too heavy. I'm not a fan of the original Chloe but this one is a new favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love just about anything floral. I sampled this scent in the store and decided to purchase it. I have received compliments when I wear it. Nice for the spring.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this perfume. I replaced my signature perfume(hermes terre du2019hermes) with this one! I cannot stop smelling myself!
Beautiful fragrance!!! Chloe really knows how to make a fragrance  Love ALL of Chloeu2019s fragrances  Definitely recommend this to everyone

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is cute, sexy and elegant. The scent is so unique. I got 3 compliments the first few hours of wearing it. This will definitely be my summer scent because its not strong and it's not light it's just right. I usually get headaches from perfumes but not this one here. I think I found my new signature perfume

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love that this travel size is a spray!!  I bought it to try before committing to the full size and I'm so glad I did.  This is a heavier fragrance, not light and floral, but I like that.  On me it's much more of a winter scent than a light, summer scent.  I would consider it in the oriental family of fragrances, along the same lines as Flowerbomb or Twilly.  I really like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It didnu2019t work well with my natural body cent. Too floral for me almost like air freshener/popurru00ede. Sprayed it lightly gave it a few days and had to return it.  For reference I use Prada Candy, Nirvana Black, YSL Mon Paris, flower bomb and Marc Jacob scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE THIS !!!! Such a unique smell, feminine and light, my husband loves it. Will definitely buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I get great compliments whenever I wear this perfume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Like others have said, this doesnu2019t smell like other Chloe fragrances (which I also like) they have a sharper edge to me..hard to describe..this is softer, definitely recommend giving it a shot!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I adore Chloe fragrances but this one is Amazing!  Its unique and modern, fresh yet musky with a hint of sweet. A bit green which i guess is an odd to the hippie era. It's one you must try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume so much! It lasts all day long and my coworkers and managers love it as well. My customers always ask what Iu2019m wearing and Iu2019m so proud to tell them about this perfume only thing is that itu2019s a little pricey

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh lord. So when you first spray it, it smells nice. Then wears off to a nice, nauseating insect repellent smell. Why? Like why does this happen? I wanted to like it so badly. I adore Chloe but this is just an attack on my senses. Newp. Just not liking it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Strong and Grandma-ish

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this.  In the store it smelled heavenly and so different from everything else.  However, I am glad I insisted on a sample.  It was lovely for the first 20 minutes of wear and then dried to a powdery scent-what happens with a lot of the florals I wear.  Perhaps because my skin is more acidic.  A few of my students said I smelled like a grandma.  Itu2019s a light powdery scent but I can see what they mean.  I think on the right person this scent will be tantalizing.  Just not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: its a very feminine, girl next door type of scent to me i like it, but I'm more of an alien or Lolita lempika typa gal lol BUT i get complements every time i wear it.. i actually like it for colder days..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is like nothing else I own. I donu2019t get floral here at all. I get woody, green, powder but fresh. This is a fragrance that I feel a man could wear. It has masculine notes. After a few hours, I feel like it smells cologne-ish. I donu2019t get sweet or flower notes. Maybe a tad bit of fruit but very slight. I would say that this is an elegant, powerful, I know what I want in life fragrance and for those who donu2019t like flower and tend to go toward more masculine scents. My husband hates floral perfumes so he actually approves of this one. Definitely spring, summer fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I can see how someone could really enjoy this scent - it is a mild floral with fruity and spicy notes. I sprayed it on my wrist in store and let it develop on my wrist over 6 hours. On me, it first sprayed on like fruity cleaning spray - then developed into a sweet floral scent. Not particularly unpleasant but not something I would buy. Too bad though, because the bottle is beautiful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely in LOVE with this scent right now! It has the perfect warm, vanilla notes I look for in all of my fragrances and it is sophisticated enough for any adult to wear! A little goes a long way with this so it will also last you a while! I put one spritz on in the AM and can still smell the scent on myself when I get home from work hours later. Overall, Chloe did an amazing job of creating a warm, vanilla scent suitable for people of all ages and I highly recommend it to all of my vanilla lovers!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: OMG I LOVE IT!!! One of the best perfumes I have ever worn.  I rotate this with Burberry Blush.  I keep bottles of both at home and then have travel size or a rollerball in my purse.  The perfume isn't one of those perfumes that knocks you out and gives you a headache. It is classy, elegant, sweet and can be worn everyday.. for any occasion.  I cannot tell you how much I love Chloe!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It smells sophisticated, sexy and feminine. It warms up to a soft and sweet smell. I love it!  Itu2019s different from any fragrance I own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Like a lot of the other reviewers, I got this sample (and a handful of others) that came as freebies in my Sephora order. I was torn between this and YSL Black Opium, which I thought would be a winner (but the vanilla in it wore me out). So, after I learned the YSL was a no-go, I tried the Chloe and its now my all around fav!  NOMADE is aMAZing. It smells sooo good, I wanted to reserve it for special occasions... but very quickly decided it is my new daily wear. I purchased the small size since there was no rollerball yet - I want to carry this one with me!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased the travel spray first and did not buy the perfume as yet because it is not in stores as yet. After trying it I am convinced that I would definitely buy the full size. This is such a lovely scent. If you are looking for a nice woodsy fresh smell this is great. Very different from the other Chloe perfumes. It smells very similar to Elie Saab edp. So if you are familiar with that perfume and are looking for something similar but you want a change this might be it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the most unique fragrances I have ever tried, and I absolutely love it. It flirts between masculine and feminine beautifully, a perfect blend of musk with sweetness and a subtle floral. Fragrances lovers will adore Nomade, I think it belongs in everyones fragrance wardrobe. I was lucky enough to receive a travel spray of this from Sephora gratis, and I couldn't be happier. I feel so honored to have been chosen to try this. It is something I would absolutely buy for myself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this fragrance when I first applied it, but it wore down on me to a very spicy gourmandy type of scent, which ended up giving me a headache. Itu2019s almost like a nutmeg or allspice kind of undercurrent that doesnu2019t show up on everybody, but if things tend to get warmer or spicier on you, I might pass this one up. If they donu2019t, then you might enjoy it. Itu2019s a soft floral with an almost woodsy tone to it thatu2019s very nice on first smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was introduced to this scent when I made an online purchase for something else.  I actually received about 7 different cards that allows you to lift and sniff.  This perfume definitely was my favorite. I loved it so much I decided to buy it during the 3x point promotion.  Itu2019s a lightly sweet scent that doesnu2019t leave you smelling musky or like you have a thick heavy fog following you throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells too strong for me. It gives me a headache.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Nomade starts off with a burst of mirabelle plum, it is somewhat effervescent and strong and not particularly pleasant.  Give it ten minutes to dry down though and the fragrance becomes deeply floral, earthy, warm and so d@mn lovely!! This perfume isn't a nasty screechy fruity floral and isnt a sweet, sickly, vanillery mess either. It is classy, tasteful, it smells expensive. Nomade is cozy, indulgent, relaxing and beautiful. Just got to push through those first few minutes!! Finally can I say how good it is to see Chloe gave us the purse size as a spray and not rollerball!

reviews.review_text: I have been looking for a new scent for spring and summer and this is the best perfume in my collection. Itu2019s my first Chloe perfume and it is amazing. I get so many compliments. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_title: Just What I Was Looking For!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I adore this scent. I first found it in a trial pack of scents that came with a previous Sephora order and I fell in love. Itu2019s such a unique and feminine scent and the bottle is so cute. I couldnu2019t wait until it was released and when it was I got the travel and full size. My roommate says itu2019s one of the best perfume scents sheu2019s ever smelled and sheu2019s looking into getting some too. DEFINITELY RECOMMEND!

reviews.review_text: not sure who chloe is but after receiving the sample I fell in LOVE. I have only worn chanel mad for YEARS because it was quite honestly my favorite but this made my nose perk up. Maybe they can share counter space. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I would rate this 4.5 stars.  I received this as a sample and was pleasantly surprised.  If you like musky smells, but have a hard time finding one on the romantic and feminine side, this is for you.  It smells floral, but that is balanced out by musk and deep notes of some kind of spruce type of smell.  I might purchase a full size in the future.   This would be great for Winter, if you rotate your scents according to seasons.
Iu2019m halfway between I like it and it smells like an average department store fragrance. I am on the fence and canu2019t decide. Definitely musky and floral.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Omg smells like sweet elegance with a tiny spice/earthy undertone. So different from the rest of the collection but most definitely the best one in my opinion!

reviews.review_title: Unique, soft, sweet. A beautiful scent.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this and instantly fell in love. It's a sweet but earthy scent. I could pick up several notes and knew instantly that I wanted more..lol. I had my husband give his thoughts, since he is very picky, and he said  I like this better than any of the perfumes you have on your desk. So I grabbed a bottle! :D I cant wait to start wearing it!

reviews.review_title: Complex but Simple; Best Yet From Chloe!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample from Sephora and all I can say is that this is an amazing fragrance! I love all the Chloe fragrances despite not particularly liking florals in general. With that said, this is DEFINITELY its own scent (if I didn't see it was Chloe I probably would never have guessed it was Chloe!) - it has almost an oriental/floral vibe (I know they're not listed in the notes but I get almost white musk/slight vanilla undertones to this) and it's definitely not as strongly scented or flowery as the other Chloe fragrances. It's also much lighter than you would think for the listed notes and the oriental kind of vibe I get from this (or like many warm florals which are often very woody - this is not!). I also really love the dry-down of this - it doesn't leave a strong scent at all but it's enough to make people sniff and ask what I'm wearing! It wears down to a beautiful slightly floral, lightly powdery (not baby powdery just that soft kind of scent!) and just slightly sweet but sophisticated scent. It also has its own kind of freshness to it without being your typical fresh/clean fragrance. This is a purchase I will definitely be making!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Received a sample and instantly fell in love! Just bought the full size bottle and cannot wait to use it everyday.
